item.title: [PI]Here We Go Again! - Built to make quests easier to make for you! Rewards!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

k1ng0frs:

Nice Quick Tips Pictures and Stuff i Like this.

Thank you. Hope it makes it out, my sis is taking the Idrivesafely.com thing, so she’s on my comp, so i can’t check some stuff (My comps the fastest in the house :))

EDIT: UPDATE: Made it that when you click the NPC it will talk to you.

[quote=“arham 4, post:1, topic:428450”][size=2][anchor=spawn]6.0 - ActionHandler.java[/size]

Now, go to ActionHandler.java and search for:

switch(npcType) {

Now under that, add:

         case 3665: //reaper
            if(c.here == 0) {
            c.getDH().sendDialogues(202, npcType);
         } else {
            c.sendMessage("Why do you need him?");
         }
         break;
}
         case 883: //sir prysin
         if(c.here == 1) {
            c.getDH().sendDialogues(569, npcType);
         } else if(c.here == 2) {
            c.getDH().sendDialogues(205, 207, npcType);
         } else if(c.here == 3) {
            c.getDH().sendDialogues(210, npcType);
         } else {
            c.sendMessage("Why do you need him?");
         }
         break;
}

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center][/quote]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Provided a fix, as I made an error as the dragon needs another int.

Coming up next update: Making it so that the server checks you completed one part of the quest and making the server check if you’ve killed the dragon.

ALSO: [Not tested so not sure if needed] Making it that when you click the NPC it will talk to you (Not sure if it’s auto does it because it says “Fear Reaper”, and I’m not on the comp that my server is on to check).

Read full topic
